title: ICE: Encountered error `Unimplemented` selecting `Binder(...)` during codegen

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
We are newly hitting this with [Juniper](https://github.com/graphql-rust/juniper/) across all channels and platforms. While there are other issues with similar errors, they either say it only happens with nightly or requires GATs, neither of which are in use here. [mac stable](https://github.com/graphql-rust/juniper/runs/442951562), [linux stable](https://github.com/graphql-rust/juniper/runs/442951547?check_suite_focus=true#step:7:2036) ``` error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/traits/codegen/mod.rs:53: Encountered error `Unimplemented` selecting `Binder(<&dyn tests::model::Human as types::async_await::GraphQLTypeAsync>)` during codegen thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:905:9 ``` ### Code https://github.com/graphql-rust/juniper/ (sorry, CI passed previously and juniper is big) ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.41.0 (5e1a79984 2020-01-27) /usr/share/rust/.cargo/bin/cargo -V cargo 1.41.0 (626f0f40e 2019-12-03) /usr/share/rust/.cargo/bin/rustup -V rustup 1.21.1 (7832b2ebe 2019-12-20) ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/traits/codegen/mod.rs:53: Encountered error `Unimplemented` selecting `Binder(<&dyn tests::model::Human as types::async_await::GraphQLTypeAsync>)` during codegen thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:905:9 ```
Backtrace
